name: Defend Your Kingdom
description: Fight legendary monsters, customizing your defensive strategy with different spells and equipments! Throw lightnings to your enemies, summon stone guardians, rise the mercenaries of darkness from the dead to fight on your side to save your Kingdom from the mystic shadow!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Pentium 4, Celeron, Atom,  Xeon Memory: 250 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
